questions: What is the default number of connections to each node in elastic?
How to increase the number of connections to each node in elastic?
What is the parameter to raise the limit of connections to each node in elastic?
answer:
# Max connections to elastic
By default, there are open up to 10 connections to each node, 
if you require more  calls the ELASTIC_MAX_CONN parameter to raise the limit:

Add the following to ThamesThrive configuration.

```yaml
    ELASTIC_MAX_CONN: 10
```
